Lyric:
[00:01.930]Blue mountain river,
[00:04.930]if only for a while,
[00:09.260]Take me to the river,
[00:13.240]I lay down by your side,
[00:17.530]The world is full of madness and I find it hard to smile,
[00:25.690]Sleep with you through winter
[00:29.930]and wait for summer time
[00:34.550]Blue mountain river,
[00:38.650]comfort me a while,
[00:43.000]I 'll follow down the river,
[00:46.850]I follow you til night,
[00:50.860]I listen to you whispers,
[00:54.600]you dance in time to mine,
[00:58.960]We'll stay awake together watching silver in the sky.
[01:06.980]Blue mountain river,
[01:10.890]I wanna rest a while,
[01:14.990]You're changing my reflection and the seasons in my mind,
[01:22.640]Let these days go on forever,
[01:27.300]I 'll leave in my own time,
[01:31.350]Take me where you're going and I 'll be right by your side.
[01:37.780]wu na na......wu na na......
[02:12.380]BLUE......
[02:25.460]Blue mountain river,
[02:28.260]I went there for a while,
[02:32.410]I listened for an answer and I found it deep inside,
[02:40.080]When I'm lost behind the shadows and I wanna run and hide,
[02:48.820]Blue mountain river is there right by my side.
[02:55.610]
[03:02.550]
